sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>knife</radical> got stuck in <radical>Wolverine</radical>'s <radical>forehead</radical>, and he has a <radical>towel</radical> wrapped around it to stop the bleeding, but he really needs to <kanji>return home</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Everything is fun and games until someone gets hurt. And in this case, very hurt. If something like this happens, it's always best to return home.
readingMnemonic: Wolverine wants to <kanji>return home</kanji>, but he can't drive himself because there's a knife in his forehead and lots of blood, so he asks his friend the <reading>ca</reading>r <reading>e</reading>lephant (<ja>かえ</ja>) to take him. Car elephant is just an elephant mutant that has a car on his back.
readingInfo: Watch as Wolverine climbs up onto car elephant and returns home. Well, this party was a failure.
